alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 5:29AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS IN THE ANCHORAGE AREA LATE THIS MORNING INTO FRIDAY... Southeast winds are expected to rapidly increase by late morning and bring in gusts of 40 to 50 mph across the Anchorage bowl this afternoon. Gusts along the hillside may reach the 60 to 70 mph range during the afternoon. Winds will then shift more south- southwest but remain gusty in the 25 to 35 mph range from this evening through Friday afternoon or evening. People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of power outages. Use caution if you must drive, especially if in a high profile vehicle. For more information from the National Weather Service visit https://weather.gov/afc
